title: Minecraft 主机版 TU53/CU43/1.48/1.49/Patch 23/Patch 3 发布
author: cc7w
txt_content:
本帖最后由 ff98sha 于 2017-6-2 06:32 编辑 

主机版即Xbox 360，Xbox One版，PlayStation 3/4/Vita版，WiiU版，由4J Studios为Mojang开发。
迎接新的正式版吧！
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。

Change log for Patch 3 - May 30th 20172017.5.30 Patch-3 更新日志
Added Glide!增加滑行玩法！Updated Switch Features to be inline with other platforms更新主机版的特性，与其他平台联动！Added Adventure Time Mash-up Pack.增加冒险时间混搭包Added Magic: The Gathering Skin Pack.增加魔法：聚集皮肤包Added Chinese Mythology Battle Map.增加中国神话战斗地图Added Temple, a free Glide track.增加了神庙，免费的滑翔翼探测器Your best run in Glide will now be recorded (as long as it is under 5 minutes), and a Ghost will fly alongside you in Solo Mode to help you improve!你最好的滑翔翼成绩会被记录（只要在5分钟下），一位幽灵在单人模式会在你身旁飞行来帮你！The default controls have been changed slightly, and you can now define your own control scheme in the options menu.微改默认设置，并且你能在选项菜单中控制你自己的配置Added Pick Block - This is unassigned by default.增加捡起方块-——这默认没有定义Added Off-hand slot for Maps and Arrows.副手位可以用地图和箭Added Shulker Box item.增加潜影盒Added Shulker Shell item.增加潜影壳Added Iron Nugget item. You can now smelt Iron and Gold armour into nuggets.增加铁粒。你现在能把铁和金装备熔成对应金属粒了More items can now be used as fuel in a furnace.更多的东西能被熔炉当燃料Added new Note Block sounds增加新的音符盒音乐Added some new sound effects for filling Cauldrons, paddling Boats, using a Fishing Rod, and End Portals.增加一些新音乐效果，如填充炼药锅，划船，使用钓鱼竿和末地传送门Using a Firework while gliding with Elytra will now give you a boost. Don't try this at home!在滑翔翼上使用烟花会给你助推效果。不要在家中使用这个！Added Concrete Powder Blocks – 16 Different colors!增加混凝土粉末方块 —— 16中不同的颜色Added Concrete Blocks – 16 Different colors!增加混凝土方块 —— 16种不同颜色Added Glazed Terracotta Block – 16 Different patterns!增加带釉陶瓦方块 —— 16中不同类型Changed the color of Dyes, Wool and Banners改变染料、羊毛和旗帜的颜色
Bug FixesBug修复
MCCE-4554 - Take Damage when falling into slime block修复掉到史莱姆方块上掉血的BUGMCCE-4704 - Fall Damage being taken in 1x1 areas修复在1X1区域中会有掉落伤害的BUGMCCE-4551 - Falling in shallow water is damaging players修复掉到浅水中玩家受伤的BUGMCCE-2308 - Player Glitched out in Battle Mode修复战斗模式中故障的BUGMCCE-2902 - Squids not spawning in anything man-made修复人造建筑中鱿鱼不生成的BUGMCCE-4604 - Battle Mode Spawn Glitch修复战斗模式生成方面的故障MCCE-2019 - Some times when with a arrow or hit the players scren will freeze or shake.有时带有箭攻击玩家屏幕会冻结或抖动MCCE-4223 - elytra fly glitch修复滑翔翼的故障MCCE-3164 - Rabbits兔子MCCE-4662 - Exp from Coal not going to mending来自煤矿的经验不修补MCCE-4591 - Map direction icon skewed地图位置图标歪斜MCCE-4278 - Banner are giant旗帜巨大化
